column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Thursday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from September 2 through September 15, 2003.The minutes are attached.Attachment (61 KB PDF)2003 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: November 6, 2003
